summary: In Chile, 1973, during the last days of Salvador Allende's presidency, an employee at a Morgue's recording office falls for a burlesque dancer who mysteriously disappears.
cast: Alfredo Castro|Antonia Zegers|Jaime Vadell|Amparo Noguera|Marcelo Alonso|Marcial Tagle|Santiago Graffigna|Ernesto Malbran|Aldo Parodi|Mario Cornejo|Varinia Aguilera|Juan Quezada|Marcelo Valdivieso|Adriano Castillo|Miguel Angel León|Constanza B. Majluf|Rodrigo Pérez|Claudia Di Girólamo|Luis Gnecco|Steve Nave|Samantha Sánchez
keywords: operation condor|augusto pinochet|coup d'etat|chilean coup d'etat|chilean coup d'etat 1973
title: Post Mortem
